sentences.sContent: students with a negative attitude to school
sentences.sCn: 对上学抱消极态度的学生

sentences.sContent: They have a uniformly negative image of the police.
sentences.sCn: 他们都对警察印象不好。

sentences.sContent: Jean rarely sounded so negative about her mother.
sentences.sCn: 琼很少这么说她母亲不好。

sentences.sContent: ...He said he worried about inexperienced riders' lack of awareness of biking rules and strong negative reaction from non-cyclists...
...Although the negative emotions associated with romantic love-fear of loss...
...I will discuss the positive and negative effects of this issue and offer my own view on it...
...People should make better use of shopping and bypass its negative effects...
...And scores of online discussion boards have popped up on which people discuss negative experiences tied to too much time on the Web...
...The $11 billion self-help industry is built on the idea that you should turn negative thoughts like "I never do anything right" into positive ones like "I can succeed"...
...It’s something I like to call it the power of negative thinking...
...What will probably have negative effects on the lives of Hollywood kids...
...a store will lose up to three more due to negative reviews...

synos.tran: [数]负的；消极的；[语]否定的；阴性的

phrases.pCn: 负面影响；负效应；负磁力效应
不利影响；消极作用；负影响
负温度，负绝对温度；零下温度
adj. 革兰氏阴性的；革兰氏〔染色）阴性的

remMethod.val: neg(否定) ＋ ative(…的) → 否定的

words.tran: 否定论；消极论；反对癖性

trans.tranOther: considering only the bad qualities of a situation, person etc and not the good ones
